series.series.name: BASEBALL: SUBWAY SERIES -- WORLD SERIES NOTEBOOK

abstract.p: New York City police arrest 14 persons and zeize hundreds of counterfeit World Series tickets (S)

block.p: The Yankees dropped the rookie left-hander Randy Choate from their 25-man roster to make room for Jose Canseco for the Series. The Yankees debated whether to keep Choate or Jason Grimsley, a right-hander who is pitching with a sore elbow that will require surgery. ''Basically, it came down to experience,'' Joe Torre said.

The Mets went with the same players who won the National League Championship Series, 15 position players and 10 pitchers. The only question had been the status of reliever Dennis Cook, who had been bothered by kidney stones. Reliever Pat Mahomes was left off for the third postseason series in a row.
